forecast.name: Overnight
forecast.detailedForecast: Patchy drizzle. Mostly cloudy, with a low around 56. West southwest wind around 8 mph. Chance of precipitation is 20%.

forecast.name: Saturday
forecast.detailedForecast: Patchy drizzle before 11am. Partly sunny, with a high near 62. West southwest wind 7 to 14 mph, with gusts as high as 21 mph. Chance of precipitation is 20%.

weather_report:
As the early morning breathes softly through Downtown San Francisco, a gentle mist lingers in the air, the promise of patchy drizzle clinging to the edges of clouds. Though the temperature sits comfortably around 56 degrees, a light wind from the west-southwest stirs, reminding us of the ocean's embrace just beyond the city. As the sun prepares to grace the horizon, one can sense the clouds reluctantly yielding to the day, hinting at a more inviting afternoon. By noon, expect the drizzle to clear, revealing swathes of partly sunny skies that will reach a high near 62, with breezes picking up, inviting the city to stretch and awaken.

In this climate, one might opt for a light jacket or a cozy sweater, perfect for greeting the cool morning but easy to shed as the sun peeks through. Today, an afternoon stroll along the Embarcadero would be delightful, maybe stopping in at a local café, savoring a warm cup while watching the ebb and flow of city life. For those compelled by the allure of adventure, a walk across the Golden Gate feels especially inviting, with the possibility of standing among the kiss of sunlight and gentle winds, far removed from the cool marine layer that blankets the morning. The character of the day flirts with the mundane yet offers whispers of charm, urging all to embrace the unpredictable ballet of San Francisco's weather.
